title: Add applyColorToStroke function
description:
Add applyColorToStroke(node: SceneNode, colorValue: string): boolean function:
- Check if node has existing strokes before applying
- Use figma.util.solidPaint() to create SolidPaint
- Only update stroke color if strokes exist (don't create new strokes)
- Log success message for stroke application
- Return true on success, false if no strokes exist
close_reason: Implemented applyColorToFill and applyColorToStroke functions using figma.util.solidPaint()

title: Add applyColorToFill function
description:
Add applyColorToFill(node: SceneNode, colorValue: string): boolean function:
- Use figma.util.solidPaint() to create SolidPaint from color string
- Apply to node.fills if node supports fills
- Wrap in try-catch for graceful validation failure
- Log success with layer name and color value
- Log warning for invalid colors with layer context
- Return true on success, false on failure
close_reason: Implemented applyColorToFill and applyColorToStroke functions using figma.util.solidPaint()

title: Integrate color detection into applyDataToContainers
description:
Modify applyDataToContainers in main/code.ts to support color mapping:
- Add color detection check AFTER URL detection but BEFORE text application
- When color detected, call applyColorToFill() on target layer
- When color detected AND layer has strokes, also call applyColorToStroke()
- Skip text application when color is detected (color takes precedence)
- Maintain existing behavior for URLs, text, images, and variants
close_reason: Integrated color detection into applyDataToContainers - checks after URL, applies to fill and stroke

title: Add color detection utility function (isColorValue)
description:
Add isColorValue(value: string): boolean function to main/code.ts with regex patterns:
- HEX: /^#([0-9A-Fa-f]{3}|[0-9A-Fa-f]{6}|[0-9A-Fa-f]{8})$/
- RGB: /^rgba?\(\s*\d+\s*,\s*\d+\s*,\s*\d+/i
- HSL: /^hsla?\(\s*\d+/i

Returns true if value matches any color pattern.
close_reason: Added isColorValue utility function with HEX, RGB, and HSL pattern detection
